title: Awesome Opencode Entry
description: Schema for validating YAML entries in the awesome-opencode list

name.description: Display name of the project or tool

tagline.description: Short punchy summary (shown in collapsed view)

description.description: Full description of the project (shown when expanded)

scope.description: Installation scope: global (~/.config/opencode/) or project (.opencode/). Defaults to [global] if omitted.

min_version.description: Minimum OpenCode version required (semver format, e.g. '1.0.0')

homepage.description: Documentation URL if different from repository

installation.description: Detailed installation instructions in markdown format
